about_the_game:
Select a different team each time you go for a run in Heroes of Magic and Steel, each one carefully designed to have a unique deck of cards, that can complement each other in many different possibilities. 

As you beat every level, you get a chance to improve the deck of every hero in your team, choose the cards that best fit your play style. If you wanna win a  run in this game you will need to think very  well when to use every card, because luck will not help you, only a deep strategy, careful planing and impecable execution can make you victorus!

Think about different strategies for each scenario, Enemies will try to beat you, but each one with a different strategy, some will overwhelm you with their numbers, others with power creatures, or buffs, its up to you to conter them and be victorious!

As you play you will be able to Improve your favorite heroes inital deck, so even if you fail, no worries, you will have a better chance next time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB / AMD Radeon RX 550 4GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Choose your team from amazing characters, each one with a unique deck of skills, add more cards as rewards and build your full deck according to the challenges you face. Create a different strategy to beat different challenges and improve your characters permanently as you play!
